A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: EVERYONE NEEDS TO CHILL OUT AND WAKE UP. This movie was REALLY good. It was a great film\, critically speaking\, and it was a great Star Wars movie\, from a true fan’s perspective. The visuals were SPECTACULAR. Every shot could be viewed as a work of art. Skellig Michael was the perfect location for Luke’s hermit home. Snoke’s throne room was beautifully intimidating. Cantonica was a luxuriously breathtaking casino planet. Every starship battle in space was far more intriguing and visually pleasing than any other battle in any other movie. The use of the Force in this movie was significantly more interesting and powerful than previous movies. The character development of the mainstays was very much welcomed\, and the introduction of several new characters did not disappoint. Do yourself a favor: see this epic movie and give it the honest 5-star review that it deserves. Please don’t listen to the haters and trolls. They’re the ones who think that Jar Jar Binks was a good character. JAR JAR BINKS. Are you kidding me?!
